title: These Photos Of Deepika Padukone Goofing Around Before The Oscars Parties Are Too Cute
text: Although we didnâ€™t see Deepika Padukone walk the Oscars red carpet, she did attend a few events surrounding the big night: the Vanity Fair after party, the Women In Film pre-Oscar party, and the Charles Finch and Chanel pre-Oscar dinner. She looked gorgeous at all of these events, but what we particularly love are those behind-the-scenes photos of her while getting dressed:
